faqData.title: How long to build a website?
faqData.content: Most brochure sites take 2-6 weeks depending on scope; ecommerce can take 6-12 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during consultation.

faqData.title: Do you provide hosting?
faqData.content: Yes, we offer managed hosting, security updates and maintenance packages for all Rotherham websites.

faqData.title: Is it mobile-friendly websites?
faqData.content: Every site we build is fully responsive and tested on mobile devices to ensure perfect functionality.

faqData.title: Do you provide help with Google Business Profile?
faqData.content: Yes, we help set up and optimize your Google Business Profile plus provide local SEO recommendations.

faqData.title: What's included in the price?
faqData.content: All websites include mobile responsiveness, basic SEO, contact forms, and training on how to update your content.

faqData.title: Is ongoing support available?
faqData.content: Yes, we offer monthly support packages including updates, backups, security monitoring, and content changes.
